name: BProgress
desc: BProgress will rotate or  bars fill to show the progress of a task or that there is a wait for a task to complete.

infoArray.name: progressType
infoArray.desc: Specifies the type of progress to display such as 'circular' or 'linear'

infoArray.name: color
infoArray.desc: Override the theme's color of the indicator while it's status is 'ready' and it's percentage is less than 100.

infoArray.name: max
infoArray.desc: The max value of progress, only works in determinate mode.

infoArray.name: min
infoArray.desc: The min value of progress, only works in determinate mode.

infoArray.name: mode
infoArray.desc: The mode of show your progress, indeterminate for when there is no value for progress. Determinate mode requires 'value' prop

infoArray.name: size
infoArray.desc: The diameter of the progress in pixels.

infoArray.name: style
infoArray.desc: Override the inline-styles of the root element.

infoArray.name: value
infoArray.desc: The value of progress, only works in determinate mode.
